TopicTitle: Kerbal riding an out of control plane

Articles.Content: See if you can make a kerbal ride a plane that has no command pod but a exterior command pod and that is out of control. I will give you the best probe in the kerbol system, one that racks up so many science points that you will poop your pants repeatedly!
I am not a mod, and am not attempting to be, but you may want to look at the challenge guidelines before you post this challenge.
